title: Ample vector bundles and moduli of tame stacks
authors: Daniel Bragg, Martin Olsson, and Rachel Webb
abstract:
We explain how to define an embedding of a tame stack over a noetherian ring
into a certain generalization of a weighted projective stack using a notion of
ample vector bundle on the stack. As applications we construct algebraic moduli
stacks of tame stacks equipped with an ample vector bundle and algebraic stacks
of tame orbicurves.
